Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I am confident it will meet your needs and exceed your expectations. We are currently offering this remarkable product at an exclusive price of $1200000.

This investment is not just about acquiring a product; it's an opportunity to revolutionize your business processes and open up new avenues for growth and success. Our team stands ready to assist you every step of the way, ensuring a smooth transition and optimal utilization of the product.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you and contributing to the prosperity of your organization.

Best regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
